data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bonato, Lucio, Voigtländer, Karin, Minelli, Alessandro (2012): Algerophilus, a neglected lineage of Western Mediterranean centipedes (Chilopoda: Geophilidae). Zootaxa 3235: 23-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280399
